name: Red end
description: A racing game. Under the azure sky, this is a huge racing park, dedicated to your race track. The beautiful scenery around you, cool red trucks, and challenging simulated mountain lanes rise and fall. You are an excellent stunt racer! You can choose your favorite car, then overcome thorny obstacles and skip the gaps on the road, make calm movements, and finally drive to the finish line and score as many points as possible. Come and show your driving skills!
